page.title: 06Education.
page.content: Kyleakin primary school is the only school in Kyleakin.In the school there are {55}pupils.The new school was opened in 1982.It is alot bigger than the old school.The old school was opened in 1870 and closed in 1982.It is now used as a commumity centre.You start in primary one at about five years old.Primary two to four are about six to eight years old.Primary five to seven are about nine to eleven years old.When you have completed primary seven you go on to secondry school at Portree or Plockton.Children from all over Skye go to Portree high school. Children from Kyleakin, Elgol, Sleat and Raasay stay in the hostel.If you go to Plockton high school you get home every night.
